entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
